text:
Polaroid Zip Wireless Mobile Mini Printer

It's all about instant gratification these days, so turn their digital memories into physical memorabilia with a click of a button. They’ll be able to print their selfies and photos with the Polaroid Zip.

Connect any smart device, via Wi-Fi, and print images on 2-by-3-inch peel-back paper that is both water- and tear-resistant.
